stories.text:
Tired of long running pull requests?

Review and merge pull requests faster with Slack reminders and notifications.

CodeKickBot provides pull request reminders and notifications that help streamline your pull request workflow and reduce code review turnaround times.

Receive real-time notifications for review requests, reviews, comments on pull requests.

CodeKickBot helps to, Improve your team's productivity. Reduce pull request review turnaround time. Increase engineering velocity.
stories.title: Show HN: CodeKickBot (GitHub pull request reminders and notifications for Slack)

stories.text: Is there a language that has TypeScript's type system, Rust's borrow checker and lack of GC/runtime and Go's simplistic threading model?
